name: Brandon Bennett
content:
Dr Brandon Bennett | School of Computer Science | University of Leeds Skip to main content University links Search Destination Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences site All leeds.ac.uk sites School of Computer Science Search Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences School of Computer Science People Profile Dr Brandon Bennett Position: Director of Postgraduate Research Studies Email: B.Bennett@leeds.ac.uk Phone: +44(0)113 343 1070 Location: 2.21 E Sir William Henry Bragg Building Research interests Reasoning about spatial relations and physical systems Reasoning with vague concepts Semantics of actions and events Representation using non-classical Logics Automated deduction Research groups and institutes Artificial Intelligence

Postgraduate research opportunities

We welcome enquiries from motivated and qualified applicants from all around the world who are interested in PhD study. Our research opportunities allow you to search for projects and scholarships.
